title: That moment you play a champ you never use in ranked...
body:
And win.

https://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2014-07/17/6/enhanced/webdr02/enhanced-16992-1405591223-1.png
 
_And_ do one of the best on the team.

http://i17.photobucket.com/albums/b68/hello_lovee_x3/gifs/ginny-weasley-wide-eyes.gif

replies.body: {{champion:54}}  Barack the Rock Obama is here to carry your yas.
Barock Obama
Rock solid.
That's when that champ goes from "champ you never use" to "your new main"

and then you feed the next five games.

Happens to me all the time....
Friend of mine was told to go AP top for lack of AP on team. Goes Maokai first time ever. Reads abilities in champ select. Makes random mastery page. Win with a 6/1/15 ish score. GG
GG Treesy
100% winrate motherfuckers bow before me!
That's when you thank your lucky stars the enemy got at least 3 horrible players.
I ended up solo bot lane as support Sion since the adc was lagging. (I won lane of course)
It was probably back in the day when his E was really good. Sion was amazing at 2v1 bot lane, so really good for laneswapping in our bronze ranked 5's games to win with some lcs cheese. ;)
It was actually post-update. I still just used his e to bully the enemy out of his lane.

Yeah, E was never nerfed damage-wise or utility-wise. The only thing that received a nerf was the mana cost, which stops being obnoxious the moment you start Doran's Ring and find out you still win most if not all trades in lane.
No his damage when you E a minion into an enemy champion was nerfed from 150% bonus dmg to 125% bonus dmg.
Was it? Oh well, the armor debuff still mauls bitches.

And then you realize you were playing Annie.
{{item:3070}}
well not all champions are equally difficult to play even if it's the first time, just need general knowledge like positioning, when to last hit or when to poke and such.
Got lucky playing zed once, lost the next 4 games with him.
Did that twice in my provs. I wouldn't recommend it, unless it's jungle Tryn

First game as Miss Fortune I ever played, I got something stupid like 31 kills.
This was a PvP game.
She's now my main ADC.
